mapper.select: SELECT review_id, write_date, content, rating, r.item_id, r.order_id, o.buyer_id FROM review r JOIN orders o ON r.order_id = o.order_id WHERE r.item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT image_src FROM image WHERE category_id = 'RIMG' AND INSTR(image_src, TO_CHAR(#{reviewId})) > 0

SELECT order_id FROM orders JOIN order_goods USING (order_id) WHERE goods_id = #{itemId} AND buyer_id = #{memberId} AND (order_id, goods_id) NOT IN (SELECT order_id, item_id AS goods_id FROM review) AND ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.insert: SELECT review_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO review (review_id, write_date, content, rating, order_id, item_id) VALUES (#{id}, SYSDATE, #{content}, #{rating}, #{order.id}, #{item.id})
INSERT INTO image (image_src, member_id, category_id) VALUES (#{imageUrl}, #{order.buyer.id}, 'RIMG')
